info.name: Dilbert Fast Dark
info.description: A dark-background theme meant for the dilbert.com site. Provides a little bit of a cleaner browsing experience. Was originally for the dilbert.com/fast part of the website until the site redesign did away with that.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.2 - Changed to accommodate the site's new design which did away with the /fast/ section.
Version 0.1 - Initial style.
